title.en: Presenting Mair Edwards on her retirement as Editor of Y Wawr
title.cy: Anrhegu Mair Edwards ar ei hymddeoliad fel Golygydd Y Wawr

description.en: 2 photographs showing Delyth Fletcher presenting Mair Edwards on her retirement as Editor of Y Wawr. Also a photograph showing members of the Wawr sub-committee – Elinor Davies; Mairlynne Davies; Tegwen Griffiths; Mair Penri; Catrin Stevens; Mair Edwards; Janet Evans; Marged Jones; Rhian Jones; Sylwen Davies; Eryl Jones; Mattie Jones; Eirlys Phillips.
description.cy: 2 lun yn dangos Delyth Fletcher yn anrhegu Mair Edwards ar ei hymddeoliad fel Golygydd Y Wawr. Hefyd llun o aelodau'r Is-bwyllgor Y Wawr -  Elinor Davies; Mairlynne Davies; Tegwen Griffiths; Mair Penri; Catrin Stevens; Mair Edwards; Janet Evans; Marged Jones; Rhian Jones; Sylwen Davies; Eryl Jones; Mattie Jones; Eirlys Phillips.
